district: Projects in every districts of Tbilisi
cardtext: Archi Card is a discount card designed for Archi residents. Archi Card owners are entitled to various discounts on technical appliances, furniture, repair materials, and all necessary gardening tools and decor items at Archi's partner stores. Additionally, the card allows them to enjoy a range of different sports and entertainment facilities with great discounts.
contact: Leave your number and our personal advisor will contact you
name: Name
terms: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply.
abouttext1: The history of Archi began in 2006 and already unites more than 38 000 residents into one big family. The company's main activities are construction and development projects. Today Archi is a leading development company in Georgia, having implemented 49 projects, among which one of the outstanding ones is an international-level apart-hotel in the high mountain resort of Bakuriani. The total construction area of the completed projects is 1 058 723 sq.m. At this stage, 25 projects are under construction, including a branded hotel in the Black Sea resort of Batumi. And in the near future, it is planned to build a new residential buildings, hotels of local and international brands in Tbilisi and at various resorts in Georgia.
abouttext2: Along with energy-efficient and comfortable residential buildings, Archi aparthotels are to be noted, which offer high-level services to apartment owners and hotel guests and are the best investment opportunity for both Georgian and foreign citizens.
abouttext3: Archi is one big family â€“ after purchasing Archi apartments, the company continues to support its residents, maximize their comfort, and offer a range of different services. Moreover, the company makes sure to organize various activities and events to bring the residents closer to one another.
abouttext4: A very successful project of Archi is the Ytong factory, which was built in partnership with the German company Xella. The factory manufactures ecologically clean, energy-efficient, and fire-resistant construction blocks. The project makes it possible to completely replace the import, as well as export the block. Investments in the project amount to 15 million US dollars.
abouttext5: Archi is distinguished by its social responsibility. 5% of the company profits are allocated for charity, nature protection, promotion of sports and healthy lifestyle, and various activities to improve social welfare.
position: Founder and Chairman of the Supervisory Board
history: Ilia Tsulaia is the founder and chairman of the board of Archi. From 2006 to 2016, he was the CEO of Archi. Ilia's tireless work and determination inspired him, together with his team and partners, to build what is now a leading development company - Archi. In 2019, Ilia became a member of Marshall Goldsmith's MG100 Coaches. Since 2019, he has been a board member of the Business Association of Georgia (BAG), the largest and most successful business association in Georgia. In 2022, he participated in the TV show 'Shark Tank Georgia' and funded several promising startups. Ilia holds a master's degree in civil law. He has also completed the following programs at leading universities worldwide (Harvard; INSEAD): Influence and Persuasion in Leadership; Executive Education - Leading for Results; Negotiation Dynamics; Strategic Leadership. Since 2022, Ilia has been continuing his studies at Harvard Business School (Owner/President Management Program).

Since 2007, Meni Benishi has been the main shareholder of the Georgian development company Archi. With 25 years of experience in sales and marketing, Meni specializes in online marketing, online advertising, strategic planning, and branding. He is involved in charitable and educational activities in Georgia and Israel. Meni actively supports startups in various industries and participated in the TV show 'Shark Tank Georgia'. Through Meni Benishi's support, a strategic partnership was formed between the University of Georgia and Israeli technology companies. Now, the company 'Webiz' provides outsourcing services to over 40 high-tech companies in Israel. Since 2016, he has been the Honorary Consul of Georgia in Israel. On May 5, 2020, Meni Benishi was appointed chairman of the Israeli-Georgian Chamber of Commerce, whose goal is to improve the investment climate and strengthen business relations between Georgia and Israel. Meni holds a master's degree in online marketing from Ohio University.

Zaza Pachulia's decision to become a partner of the development company 'Archi' in 2019 was not surprising to those who know him well. Zaza has a close connection to his homeland and has always wanted to contribute to Georgia's economic development. His involvement with the company spans several years, during which time he has participated in many of Archi's activities and projects. In addition to his business endeavors, Pachulia is widely known for his successful basketball career. He is a Georgian professional basketball veteran who played for several NBA teams, including the Orlando Magic, Atlanta Hawks, Milwaukee Bucks, and Dallas Mavericks. Now, with the Golden State Warriors, he serves as the liaison between the business and basketball departments. As a player, he became a two-time NBA champion in 2017 and 2018. Along with his success in basketball, Pachulia represented Georgia in international basketball competitions. He played for the national team for 17 years and was the team's captain in many tournaments. Pachulia is considered one of the greatest basketball players in Georgia's history and is a role model for aspiring basketball players.

Shio Khetsuriani joined Archi's team as CEO in 2019. During his successful career, he held the position of chairman at the State Services Development Agency and was the business development director at UGT. With his many years of experience and innovative vision, he has implemented numerous successful projects for the company's development, including helping it overcome the challenges of the Covid-19 crisis. In his professional development journey, he has earned the status of graduate from Harvard Business School and Baruch College. With his strong vision, focused on continuous development, he successfully leads Archi, the leading real estate development company in Georgia.
sectiontext: Archi is a company with high corporate social responsibility. It spends 5% of profits for environmental care, sports development, promotion of healthy lifestyle, charity and various other useful activities. Archi actively supports successful and novice athletes. The company gave many world champions apartments in their projects as a gift. Charity and caring for the environment are daily activities of Archi, a clear example of this is the campaign #Archicares, in which every Archi resident can participate. Within the framework of this campaign, Archi residents have already helped many people and planted numerous trees.
